headline: Is Trade Desk (TTD) Now An Opportunity After A 65% One Year Share Price Slide?
summary: If you are wondering whether Trade Desk is now a bargain or still looks expensive, the key is to separate the recent share price slide from the company’s underlying value. The stock last closed at US$25.16, with returns of a 1.3% decline over 7 days, a 25.6% decline over 30 days, a 33.2% decline year to date, a 65.3% decline over 1 year, a 54.6% decline over 3 years, and a 63.8% decline over 5 years. These moves sit against a backdrop of ongoing interest in digital advertising and...
